column1: # Create such a file and place it into the root of your JAR (thus the class loader can find it) to register
# As you see here, this file supports comments (the '#' must be at the beginning of the file).
# All MimeTypeDetector.csv files must be encoded in UTF-8.
# The columns must be separated by tab (ASCII 9) characters, all columns except for the first are optional,
# and the following columns exist in this order:

column2: * clazz: Fully qualified class name of a class implementing eu.medsea.mimeutil.detector.MimeTypeDetector
* detectorID: Unique identifier - defaults to the class name (clazz) if not specified.
* orderHint: A number from 0 to 9999 indicating when to execute the detector (greater number means later).
